title: WhatsApp +4.52C-Unlocked (Alien)
description:
WHATSAPPÃ¢â€žÂ¢ PLUS V4.52D (UNLOCKED) [ no root needed]



Requirements: Android OS 2.1 + 


Overview: What is WhatsApp+? Basically it is a customizable WhatsApp where you can change lots of colours, sizes, and many other visual MODs In addition you can increase upload media limit (stock limit is 16Mb) to send large music files or videos.

You can increase quality of pictures sent (by default resolution is decreased quite a lot) You can share music just with one click You can add contact profile pictures to their chats You can hide contact profile pictures and show phonebook pictures (in chat screen) Built-in theme viewer and downloader. Check WhatsApp+ users themes online and apply theme if you like And more to come Remember to previously uninstall whatsapp if you come from the official version (if not you will get the "not installed" error)



Changelog : 

v4.52D
*More bugs fixed (background color in Chat, group names color in Chats, download/play text in Chat...

v4.51D
*minor big fixes and error fixes

v4.50D
*Base updated to play store version: 2.11.109 (fix notification bug introduced in 2.11.96, add change number functionality, bug fixes, translations and improvements) 
*Map not loading when sharing location fixed 
*Added option to Theme Chooser to sort themes by number of downloads (total or today) 
*Added option to check TOP WEEK Themes 
*Other minor bugs solved

v4.45D
* Wrong version in 'About' screen solved
* 'Disable Voice Notes MOD' is back
* New MOD 2.2.7D date pending Msg Color in Chats screen
* New MOD 2.2.21 to change voice note mic icon color
* Other minor bugs solved

v4.40D
*Base updated to play store version: 2.11.93
*Fixed Force Close when sharing an edited video
*Fixed bug when applying a theme, causing language changes to english
*Clean Option improved. More controllable
*Other minor bugs solved



NOTE:

This is unlocked version, no root or key needed to using hide online status 



Tested And Working...
Scanned (With Kaspersky) And 100% Clean.
